title: Poro Icon
body:
is this gameplay? not strategy, but gameplay?

So, the poro icons from poro king game mode last year. Can you guys make those useful again, and make it so;

For every poro icon, it adds 1 ambient poro matching the icon somewhere on the howling abyss map.

So say, I equip my gentleman poro, a gentleman poro will appear, either taking place of one of the other normal poros, or talking place and a background. I need Lord Gregory III to accompany me.

replies.body:
The only reason they cant do this is because it was advertised at the time as a temporary thing and if it was a permanent in game effect more people would have bought it and riot would have charged more. so as well as it not being fair to those who didnt buy one, riot cant make as much money from it, so what they need to do is re-sell the icons at a higher price and advertise them as permanent, but how many times has riot done such a thing out of context? no if that was to happen it will happen at christmas time when there is context for poros.

but i second this idea 

+1

+1

Riot could even have it so the icons change the visual effects of the "Mark" summoner spell used in standard ARAM to match the "Poro Toss" summoner spell from the event, with the little poro follower and everything.
